import React from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; const Home = () => { return (

); }; // Ultra-premium styling with glassmorphism and modern aesthetics const styles = { container: { minHeight: "100vh", fontFamily: "'Poppins', sans-serif", color: "#0a192f", backgroundColor: "#f8fafc", overflowX: "hidden", }, // Navigation navbar: { position: "fixed", top: 0, left: 0, right: 0, display: "flex", justifyContent: "space-between", alignItems: "center", padding: "1.5rem 5%", backgroundColor: "rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.8)", backdropFilter: "blur(10px)", WebkitBackdropFilter: "blur(10px)", boxShadow: "0 4px 30px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.05)", zIndex: 100, borderBottom: "1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.3)", }, navLogo: { fontSize: "1.8rem", fontWeight: 700, color: "#0a192f", }, navLogoAccent: { color: "#3b82f6", }, navLinks: { display: "flex", gap: "2rem", }, navLink: { color: "#0a192f", textDecoration: "none", fontWeight: 500, fontSize: "1rem", transition: "all 0.3s ease", position: "relative", padding: "0.5rem 0", ":hover": { color: "#3b82f6", }, "::after": { content: '""', position: "absolute", bottom: 0, left: 0, width: 0, height: "2px", backgroundColor: "#3b82f6", transition: "width 0.3s ease", }, ":hover::after": { width: "100%", }, }, // Hero Section hero: { display: "flex", alignItems: "center", minHeight: "100vh", padding: "0 5%", paddingTop: "80px", background: "linear-gradient(135deg, #f8fafc 0%, #e2e8f0 100%)", position: "relative", overflow: "hidden", }, heroContent: { flex: 1, maxWidth: "600px", position: "relative", zIndex: 2, }, heroBadge: { display: "inline-block", backgroundColor: "#3b82f6", color: "white", padding: "0.25rem 0.75rem", borderRadius: "50px", fontSize: "0.8rem", fontWeight: 600, marginBottom: "1rem", boxShadow: "0 4px 15px rgba(59, 130, 246, 0.3)", }, heroTitle: { fontSize: "3.5rem", fontWeight: 700, lineHeight: 1.2, marginBottom: "1.5rem", color: "#0a192f", }, heroTitleAccent: { background: "linear-gradient(90deg, #3b82f6, #8b5cf6)", WebkitBackgroundClip: "text", WebkitTextFillColor: "transparent", }, heroSubtitle: { fontSize: "1.25rem", color: "#64748b", lineHeight: 1.6, marginBottom: "2.5rem", maxWidth: "500px", }, heroButtons: { display: "flex", gap: "1rem", }, heroIllustration: { flex: 1, position: "relative", height: "100%", minHeight: "500px", }, heroGraphic: { position: "absolute", width: "600px", height: "600px", right: 0, top: "50%", transform: "translateY(-50%)", borderRadius: "30px", background: "linear-gradient(145deg, rgba(59,130,246,0.1) 0%, rgba(139,92,246,0.1) 100%)", boxShadow: "20px 20px 60px #d1d5db, -20px -20px 60px #ffffff", "::before": { content: '""', position: "absolute", width: "100%", height: "100%", background: "radial-gradient(circle at 70% 30%, rgba(59,130,246,0.15) 0%, transparent 50%)", borderRadius: "30px", }, }, // Buttons link: { textDecoration: "none", }, primaryButton: { display: "flex", alignItems: "center", gap: "0.5rem", padding: "0.9rem 2rem", fontSize: "1rem", fontWeight: 600, color: "white", background: "linear-gradient(90deg, #3b82f6, #6366f1)", border: "none", borderRadius: "10px", cursor: "pointer", transition: "all 0.3s ease", boxShadow: "0 4px 15px rgba(59, 130, 246, 0.4)", position: "relative", overflow: "hidden", zIndex: 1, ":hover": { transform: "translateY(-3px)", boxShadow: "0 8px 25px rgba(59, 130, 246, 0.5)", }, "::before": { content: '""', position: "absolute", top: 0, left: 0, width: "100%", height: "100%", background: "linear-gradient(90deg, #6366f1, #3b82f6)", opacity: 0, zIndex: -1, transition: "opacity 0.3s ease", }, ":hover::before": { opacity: 1, }, }, secondaryButton: { display: "flex", alignItems: "center", gap: "0.5rem", padding: "0.9rem 2rem", fontSize: "1rem", fontWeight: 600, color: "#3b82f6", background: "transparent", border: "2px solid #3b82f6", borderRadius: "10px", cursor: "pointer", transition: "all 0.3s ease", position: "relative", overflow: "hidden", zIndex: 1, ":hover": { color: "white", transform: "translateY(-3px)", boxShadow: "0 8px 25px rgba(59, 130, 246, 0.2)", }, "::before": { content: '""', position: "absolute", top: 0, left: 0, width: "100%", height: "0%", background: "#3b82f6", zIndex: -1, transition: "height 0.3s ease", }, ":hover::before": { height: "100%", }, }, buttonIcon: { fontSize: "1.2rem", }, // Features Section features: { padding: "8rem 5%", backgroundColor: "white", }, sectionHeader: { textAlign: "center", marginBottom: "4rem", }, sectionTitle: { fontSize: "2.5rem", fontWeight: 700, color: "#0a192f", marginBottom: "1rem", }, sectionSubtitle: { fontSize: "1.1rem", color: "#64748b", maxWidth: "600px", margin: "0 auto", }, featuresGrid: { display: "grid", gridTemplateColumns: "repeat(auto-fit, minmax(300px, 1fr))", gap: "2rem", maxWidth: "1200px", margin: "0 auto", }, featureCard: { backgroundColor: "white", borderRadius: "15px", padding: "2.5rem 2rem", boxShadow: "0 10px 30px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.05)", transition: "all 0.4s cubic-bezier(0.25, 0.8, 0.25, 1)", position: "relative", overflow: "hidden", border: "1px solid rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.03)", ":hover": { transform: "translateY(-10px)", boxShadow: "0 15px 40px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1)", }, }, featureIconContainer: { width: "60px", height: "60px", borderRadius: "15px", background: "linear-gradient(135deg, rgba(59,130,246,0.1) 0%, rgba(139,92,246,0.1) 100%)", display: "flex", alignItems: "center", justifyContent: "center", marginBottom: "1.5rem", }, featureIcon: { fontSize: "1.8rem", background: "linear-gradient(90deg, #3b82f6, #8b5cf6)", WebkitBackgroundClip: "text", WebkitTextFillColor: "transparent", }, featureTitle: { fontSize: "1.4rem", fontWeight: 600, color: "#0a192f", marginBottom: "1rem", }, featureText: { color: "#64748b", lineHeight: 1.6, fontSize: "1rem", }, featureHoverEffect: { position: "absolute", top: 0, left: 0, width: "100%", height: "100%", background: "linear-gradient(135deg, rgba(59,130,246,0.03) 0%, rgba(139,92,246,0.03) 100%)", zIndex: -1, }, // Stats Section stats: { display: "flex", justifyContent: "center", gap: "3rem", padding: "4rem 5%", backgroundColor: "#f1f5f9", flexWrap: "wrap", }, statItem: { textAlign: "center", minWidth: "200px", }, statNumber: { fontSize: "3rem", fontWeight: 700, color: "#3b82f6", marginBottom: "0.5rem", background: "linear-gradient(90deg, #3b82f6, #8b5cf6)", WebkitBackgroundClip: "text", WebkitTextFillColor: "transparent", }, statLabel: { fontSize: "1.1rem", color: "#64748b", fontWeight: 500, }, }; export default Home;
